languages.text: "Предлагаю сделку. За твое участие в моем представлении ты можешь рассчитывать на запасы "сопротивления". Просто держи язык за зубами, а палец — подальше от спускового крючка".
"How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаю сделку. За твое участие в моем представлении ты можешь рассчитывать на запасы "сопротивления". Просто держи язык за зубами, а палец — подальше от спускового крючка".

traits.locale_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

languages.text: “不如我们做笔交易吧？你参加我的演出，我允许你进入‘反抗军’的仓库。你只要把嘴闭得紧紧的，把手指从扳机上拿开就好。”
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: “不如我们做笔交易吧？你参加我的演出，我允许你进入‘反抗军’的仓库。你只要把嘴闭得紧紧的，把手指从扳机上拿开就好。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「ひとつ取引をしませんか？私のショーに参加していただければ、"レジスタンス"の備品を自由に使っていただいて結構です。そちらは黙って、引き金を引かないようにすればいいだけ」
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつ取引をしませんか？私のショーに参加していただければ、"レジスタンス"の備品を自由に使っていただいて結構です。そちらは黙って、引き金を引かないようにすればいいだけ」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¿Qué tal si hacemos un trato? Usted participa en mi espectáculo y yo le doy acceso a las reservas de "la resistencia". Solo tiene que mantener la boca cerrada y los dedos alejados del gatillo».
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué tal si hacemos un trato? Usted participa en mi espectáculo y yo le doy acceso a las reservas de "la resistencia". Solo tiene que mantener la boca cerrada y los dedos alejados del gatillo».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

languages.text: « Et si on passait un marché ? Vous participez à mon petit spectacle, et je vous donne accès aux stocks de la "résistance". Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous taire et garder le doigt sur la gâchette. »
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: « Et si on passait un marché ? Vous participez à mon petit spectacle, et je vous donne accès aux stocks de la "résistance". Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous taire et garder le doigt sur la gâchette. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Wie wäre es mit einer Abmachung? Ihr nehmt an meiner Show teil und erhaltet dafür Zugang zu den Lagern des 'Widerstands'. Ihr müsst nur den Mund halten und Euren Finger vom Abzug nehmen."
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: "Wie wäre es mit einer Abmachung? Ihr nehmt an meiner Show teil und erhaltet dafür Zugang zu den Lagern des 'Widerstands'. Ihr müsst nur den Mund halten und Euren Finger vom Abzug nehmen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Anlaşma yapmaya ne dersin? Sen benim gösterimde yer al, ben de sana 'direnişin' dükkânlarını açayım. Bir tek çeneni kapalı, parmağını da tetikten uzakta tutacaksın."
languages.original_text: "How about a deal? You take part in my show, and I give you access to the stores of 'the resistance.' You just keep your mouth shut and your finger off the trigger."

traits.locale_text: "Bir anlaşma yapmaya ne dersin? Sen benim gösterimde yer al, ben de sana 'direnişin' dükkânlarını açayım. Tek yapman gereken çeneni kapalı, parmağını da tetikten uzakta tutmak."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
